name: Fantastic and Sparkling Night @ I - City
description:
I-City located in Shah Alam, Selangor is known as the city of digital lights. It is recognised at the first lightscape tourism destination in Malaysia with state-of- the-art LED technology showcase. 

The digital city includes trendy shopping streets and equipped with a theme park such as Water World, Red carpet Wax Museum, 3D Trick Museum and Snow Walk to cater to visitors' looking for a place to unwind.
